title: US envoy Witkoff to hold talks with Iran; tensions rise as USS Abraham Lincoln downs Shahed drone—what we know so far
summary_full: A US F-35C fighter jet shot down an Iranian drone approaching an American aircraft carrier, escalating tensions. This incident occurred just as Iran's president signaled a willingness for negotiations with the US. Despite the drone downing, planned diplomatic talks in Turkey are reportedly still scheduled.
